motions.title: Motion to Table Multiple Agenda Items
motions.description: Motion to table agenda items 8, 15, 17, 19, and 20 to a future meeting date.

motions.title: Service Delivery Strategy for DeKalb County and City of Dunwoody
motions.description: Approval of Service Delivery Strategy for DeKalb County and the City of Dunwoody.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of consent agenda including: • July 25, 2022, City Council meeting minutes • Request approval for the disposal and transfer of obsolete rifle plates and armored helmets

motions.title: Contract Award for Consulting Services for Study of Police Department
motions.description: Award of contract to BerryDunn for consulting services to conduct a study of the police department for flat fee not-to-exceed $117,500. Project anticipated to take eight months.

motions.title: Acceptance of Bid for 4553 and 4555 North Shallowford Road Property
motions.description: Acceptance of bid from Summit Healthcare Group, LLC for $7,780,000 for property at 4553 and 4555 North Shallowford Road.

motions.title: Fourth Amendment to Purchase and Sale Agreement
motions.description: Approval of Fourth Amendment to Purchase and Sale Agreement with Summit Healthcare Group, LLC and authorize Mayor to execute same subject to final legal review.

motions.title: Contract with Sol Construction for Dunwoody Road Sidewalk Project
motions.description: Approval of contract with Sol Construction for Dunwoody Road sidewalk project in amount of $549,111 plus 10% contingency for sidewalk construction on Dunwoody Road and Chamblee Dunwoody Road at Oakpointe Place.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for the purpose of litigation, real estate, and personnel discussion.

specialEvents.title: Administration of Oath of Office - Multiple Officers
specialEvents.description: Mayor Deutsch administered oath of office to Officers Ernesto Green, Terrance Alexander, Brandon Everett, David Stone, and Taylor Mossman.

specialEvents.title: DPD Teen Police Academy Class 2022-002 Graduates
specialEvents.description: Recognition of Dunwoody Police Department Teen Police Academy Class 2022-002 graduates.

specialEvents.title: Officer and Employee of the 2nd Quarter Awards
specialEvents.description: Officer of the 2nd Quarter awarded to Officer Alex Cheung and Employee of the 2nd Quarter to Liz Stell.

specialEvents.title: Proclamation Recognizing Jerry Rhea
specialEvents.description: Proclamation recognizing Dunwoody resident Jerry Rhea on his 'Award of Excellence' by the Pro Football Hall of Fame, proclaiming August 8, 2022, as Jerry Rhea Day and presenting him with a key to the city.

publicHearings.title: Text Amendment to Regulate Materials for Residential Driveways (First Read)
publicHearings.description: First read of text amendment to regulate materials for residential driveways. Council requested revisions to prevent spreading gravel across majority of front yards but allow gravel driveways with 35% limit and standards for construction.

presentations.title: Trail Master Plan Discussion by Path Foundation
presentations.description: Information on how PATH Foundation could assist city in creating trail master plan. Cost approximately $100,000 and would take 6-8 months to complete.

discussionItems.title: Contract with Triscapes for Road and Stormwater Maintenance
discussionItems.description: City elected to end contract with current vendor. Staff recommending award to Triscapes Inc. to be brought to August 22 meeting for approval.
